personal.name: Dr. Naila Marir
personal.title: Assistant Professor
personal.tagline: AI & Cybersecurity Researcher | Data-Centric AI | Federated Learning | Big Data Analytics

contact.address: Qasr Khuzam St. Kilo. 2 Old Mecca Road. P.O.BOX 34689 - Jeddah 21478 Saudi Arabia

summary: Dr. Naila Marir serves as an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science Department at Effat University. She earned her PhD in Computer Science and Technology and specializes in artificial intelligence and cybersecurity. Her research is centered on Data-Centric AI, Federated Learning, and Big Data Analytics, with a strong emphasis on enhancing cybersecurity through Generative AI and Deep Learning. Dr. Marir's work advances Deep Learning techniques and their applications in Network Security, addressing critical challenges in data security and integrity. Additionally, she is dedicated to exploring Natural Language Processing and Sentiment Analysis to deepen understanding of human language for impactful real-world applications. Dr. Marir is committed to developing ethical AI solutions that prioritize privacy and security.

chatbot_responses.greetings: Hello! I'm here to help you learn about Dr. Naila Marir. You can ask me about her research, publications, education, skills, or contact information.
chatbot_responses.research: Dr. Marir's research focuses on Data-Centric AI, Federated Learning, Big Data Analytics, and Cybersecurity. She specializes in using Deep Learning and Generative AI to enhance network security and detect anomalies.
chatbot_responses.education: Dr. Marir holds a PhD in Computer Science and Technology from Harbin Engineering University (2015-2019), a Master's in Computer Science from University of Skikda, Algeria (2012-2014), and a Bachelor's in Mathematics and Computer Science from the same university (2009-2012).
chatbot_responses.position: Dr. Marir is currently an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science Department at Effat University, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, since August 2024.
chatbot_responses.publications: Dr. Marir has published over 15 research papers in prestigious journals and conferences, including IEEE Access and IEEE Transactions. Notable work includes research on distributed abnormal behavior detection using Deep Learning techniques and Apache Spark.
chatbot_responses.skills: Dr. Marir is proficient in Python, Java, Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras), Big Data technologies (Apache Spark, Hadoop), cybersecurity tools, and Business Intelligence platforms like PowerBI.
chatbot_responses.awards: Dr. Marir received the IEEE ICKII 2019 Best Paper Award, scholarships from both the Chinese Government and Algerian Ministry, and multiple Top Student Awards.
chatbot_responses.contact: You can reach Dr. Marir at namarir@effatuniversity.edu.sa or call +966 50 7337478. She's based at Effat University in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
chatbot_responses.teaching: Dr. Marir teaches courses including Machine Learning, Data Preprocessing, Cybersecurity, Business Intelligence, Natural Language Processing, Operating Systems, and more.
chatbot_responses.ai: Dr. Marir specializes in Data-Centric AI, Federated Learning, Generative AI, and Deep Learning. Her work focuses on developing ethical AI solutions that prioritize privacy and security.
chatbot_responses.cybersecurity: Her cybersecurity research includes Network Security, Intrusion Detection Systems, IoT Security, and Malware Generation and Detection using AI techniques.
chatbot_responses.nlp: Dr. Marir works on Natural Language Processing and Sentiment Analysis, particularly in analyzing MOOC learner reviews and social media content for various applications.
chatbot_responses.spark: Dr. Marir has extensive experience with Apache Spark and Big Data Analytics. Her notable publication 'Distributed Abnormal Behavior Detection Approach based on Deep Belief Network and Ensemble SVM using Spark' was published in IEEE Access (2018).
chatbot_responses.federated_learning: Dr. Marir's research includes Federated Learning as a key area. She works on privacy-preserving deep learning techniques and distributed AI systems that maintain data security and integrity.
chatbot_responses.default: I can help you learn about Dr. Marir's research areas, education, publications, skills, teaching experience, or contact information. What specific topic interests you?
